page.title: 07Basingstoke Police Patrol
page.content: A Chief Inspector came to our school on 6th June 1985. We asked him questions . His{policemen} patrol the M3{Motorway}from Winchester to Frimley. He said he had been a policeman for 22 years and has never let{criminals}get away. He reports to Whitchurch{police station}and works 8 hour{shifts.}If{accidents}occur the police fire{flares and rockets.}The policeman said he had had half a dozen he patrols in a Jaguar car. The highest speed he has driven in a patrol car is 125 MPH. on Sunday you will find about 3000 cars. He said that he never gets involved in fights.He never arrests{tramps}because they smell a lot. He answered our questions for about 1 hour. Then he gave us 3{stickers,}a{song sheet}and a{bookmark.}Then he left.
